articles.title: 2 more local COVID-19 fatalities as death toll continues to rise across Florida - Villages-News

articles.title: U.S. administers 105.7 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines: CDC - Reuters
articles.description: The United States has administered 105,703,501 doses of COVID-19 vaccines in the country and distributed 135,846,665 doses as of Saturday, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said.

articles.title: 3 vaccinated Hawaii residents tested positive for COVID-19 - WGN TV Chicago
articles.description: A health care worker who received the full dosage of COVID-19 vaccine and followed recommended guidelines contracted the virus after traveling outside of Hawaii, the state’s health department said in a news release.
